examples.example: 只要我们每个人都付出努力，汇聚起来的力量将会超过一亿份。

translate.english: As long as each of us makes efforts, the power gathered will exceed 100 million parts.

examples.example: 中国有十四亿人口，每人贡献一点爱，那汇聚起来的温暖将超过一亿份。

translate.english: China has a population of 1.4 billion. If everyone contributes a little love, the warmth gathered will exceed 100 million portions.

examples.example: 我的梦想是赚到一亿，然后去帮助更多有需要的人。

translate.english: My dream is to earn 100 million and then go to help more people in need.
